Judul: THE APPLICATION OF KNOWLEDGE SHARING ON A UNIVERSITY
Abstrak:
Knowledge Management, especially in Knowledge Sharing is one of the significandt matters at the 

organization level because Knowledge Sharing is the approach required to facilitate the record of 

knowledge and to encourage the effectiveres of sharing among colleagues. 

The application of Knowledge Sharing System on Web, expectedly becoming one of the solution on the 

organization requirement, being having no sharing manner among the lecturers to carry out the 

Knowledge Management (Knowledge Sharing) will cause the unsharable knowledge owned by the 

lecturers which is happening in STMIK Widya Dharma. The circumstance causes different material for 

the same subject taught by morethan one lecturers to the students in STMIK Widya Dharma. This 

research analyzes the design and the application of the Knowledge Management System on Web which 

will be used in the teaching learning process in STMIK Widya Dharma. The website design is carried out 

by custommade started by identifying the system requirement using UML method model. The model uses 

ZachmanÃ‚Â’s Framework for the process design, the installation and custommade of CMS Wordpress and 

the implementation of the custommade result. 

Based on the result of the reseach, 19,33% disagree and 80,67% agree will ease the use of the Knowledge 

Management System application in STMIK Widya Dharma. The result is expected to contribute on the 

Knowledge Sharing among teaching learning process among lecturers in STMIK Widya Dharma.
Penulis: Tony Darmanto, Hoga Saragih, Bobby Reza
Kata Kunci: knowledge, knowledge management, knowledge sharing, knowledge transfer, perancangan web, penerapan knowledge management, UML
